data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in high up the field for CSKA Moscow in Moscow.
In the minute 2, CSKA Moscow needs to be cautious. Rostov have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Rostov in the half of CSKA Moscow.
Ball safe as CSKA Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 5, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards the home team a throw-in.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
Free kick for Rostov in their own half.
In the minute 6, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The match at VEB Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Baktiyor Zaynutdinov, who is down injured.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Rostov.
In the minute 9, Viktor Vasin (CSKA Moscow) has replaced the possibly injured Baktiyor Zaynutdinov at VEB Arena.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards CSKA Moscow a goal kick.
Ivan Oblyakov for CSKA Moscow drives towards goal at VEB Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 12, Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
CSKA Moscow's Hordur Magnusson is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 12, Goal kick for Rostov at VEB Arena.
CSKA Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Rostov in their own half.
In the minute 15, Rostov to take a throw-in in CSKA Moscow territory.
Rostov are pushing forward but Pontus Almqvist's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
In the minute 16, CSKA Moscow pushes forward through Konstantin Kuchaev, whose finish on goal is saved.
Rostov have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
Rostov are whistled for offside.
In the minute 19, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Goal! Konstantin Kuchaev gives CSKA Moscow a 1-0 lead.
Adolfo Gaich instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 22, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Rostov close to the penalty box.
CSKA Moscow have a goal kick.
Can Rostov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half?
In the minute 26, CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Rostov in their own half.
Throw-in for Rostov close to the penalty box.
In the minute 27, Rostov have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Rostov capitalize from this throw-in deep inside CSKA Moscow's half?
Rostov to take a throw-in in CSKA Moscow territory.
In the minute 29, CSKA Moscow's Arnor Sigurdsson breaks free at VEB Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Rostov goal kick.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a throw-in for CSKA Moscow, close to Rostov's area.
In the minute 32, Rostov will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from CSKA Moscow.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Rostov at VEB Arena.
In the minute 34, Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rostov's half?
CSKA Moscow needs to be cautious. Rostov have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 37, Adolfo Gaich (CSKA Moscow) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Rostov's half.
In Moscow, Konstantin Maradishvili of CSKA Moscow is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 38, Throw-in high up the field for CSKA Moscow in Moscow.
CSKA Moscow's Adolfo Gaich gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Rostov defender.
Important block from the Rostov defence as Nikola Vlasic fires in a strike for CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 38, In Moscow CSKA Moscow attack through Alan Dzagoev. The finish is off target, however.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards Rostov a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a CSKA Moscow goal kick.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Rostov.
CSKA Moscow's Ivan Oblyakov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
In the minute 43, Throw-in CSKA Moscow.
Rostov push upfield and Pontus Almqvist gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert CSKA Moscow defence.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a throw-in for Rostov, close to CSKA Moscow's area.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Moscow.
In Moscow CSKA Moscow drive forward through Adolfo Gaich. His shot is on target but it's saved.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at VEB Arena.
Nikola Vlasic for CSKA Moscow gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Rostov have a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Rostov.
CSKA Moscow push forward at VEB Arena and Nikola Vlasic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Rostov defence.
Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rostov's half?
In the minute 51, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Goal kick for CSKA Moscow at VEB Arena.
CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Rostov territory.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for CSKA Moscow at VEB Arena.
Goal kick for Rostov at VEB Arena.
Corner awarded to Rostov.
Rostov have been given a penalty...
In the minute 59, Viktor Vasin (CSKA Moscow) has received a yellow card from Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
Alan Dzagoev is booked for the home team.
In the minute 61, Roman Eremenko (Rostov) has missed a penalty!
The home team replace Adolfo Gaich with Fedor Chalov.
In the minute 63, CSKA Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
CSKA Moscow make their third substitution with Chidera Ejuke replacing Arnor Sigurdsson.
Nikola Vlasic of CSKA Moscow smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Rostov's half.
In the minute 66, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
CSKA Moscow drives forward and Nikola Vlasic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
CSKA Moscow's Fedor Chalov gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Rostov defender.
In the minute 68, Ivan Oblyakov for CSKA Moscow gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
Vladimir Obukhov is replacing Pontus Almqvist for Rostov at VEB Arena.
In the minute 68, Roman Tugarev is on a sub for Roman Eremenko for Rostov.
Rostov have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
Rostov are coming forward and Armin Gigovic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 70, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards CSKA Moscow a goal kick.
Fedor Chalov of CSKA Moscow smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Rostov's half.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Rostov.
Fedor Chalov puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
In the minute 74, That's a fine assist from Alan Dzagoev.
Rostov have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
Corner awarded to Rostov.
In the minute 78, Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Rostov to take a throw-in in CSKA Moscow territory.
Ilia Shkurin is replacing Konstantin Kuchaev for the home team.
In the minute 80, The home team replace Alan Dzagoev with Kristijan Bistrovic.
Can Rostov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half?
Can CSKA Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rostov's half?
In the minute 83, Throw-in CSKA Moscow.
Haitam Aleesami is on a sub for Nikolay Poyarkov for Rostov.
David Tosevski is replacing Dmitri Poloz for the away team.
In the minute 84, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in the half of Rostov.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Rostov's half.
In the minute 86, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards the home team a throw-in.
Rostov's David Tosevski gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a CSKA Moscow goal kick.
In the minute 88, Ball safe as CSKA Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Chidera Ejuke of CSKA Moscow gets in a strike, but is off target.
Rostov have a goal kick.
Free kick Rostov.
CSKA Moscow have a goal kick.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow.
Full-time! The final score is 2-0.
Rostov make their fifth substitution with Danila Sukhomlinov replacing Kento Hashimoto.
Kristijan Bistrovic (CSKA Moscow) has received a first yellow card.
